TopicTitle: Help finding a mod or plugin where the austronauts can run out of zoxygen.

Articles.Content: Hi! Please help. Where can I find and download the version/mod/plugin that shows the astronauts turning blue when they have a lack of zoxygen? Thanks!
There was a plugin called "Let's eat! (sleep and drink, too!)" which added that and more, like CO2 scrubbers and water. I've no idea if it works with .22, though
I honestly was not there back then, but I'm pretty sure the zoxygen mod was for KSP 0.14 or something. There are other life support mods but I think that one is far far outdated man.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/26935-0-20-Ioncross-Crew-Support-Plugin-%28-0-22-dev-build%29

Ioncross-Crew Support. I think this is the closest to what you are asking about currently.
